newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Hoyts to expand into Chile.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Hoyts to expand into Chile.

text.p: Australian-based cinema operator Hoyts Cinemas Ltd said on Wednesday it planned to expand into Chile and would design, develop and operate four multiplex cinema sites in Santiago with 42 screens in 1997.
It said it also had plans to develop a further three sites with 30 screens in Chile by August 1998.
Hoyts said the plans would make it one of Chile's top two exhibitors, with a long-term competitive advantage.

Chief executive officer Peter Ivany said the company had spent the past 18 months researching countries where cinema exhibition markets are underderveloped. "Chile represents one of these underdeveloped markets," he said in a statement.
The capital city of Santiago has a population of six million people, 80 percent of whom can afford to visit a cinema, Hoyts said.
However, Santiago was "significantly under-screened" with only 40 screens for the entire city.
